import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Book} from "./dto/book"; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'front_end'; bookList:Array =[]; constructor(private http:HttpClient) { http.get>('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/books'). subscribe(bookList=>this.bookList=bookList); } }
